trans-unit.source: PID for poiCollections: Define a storage pid where to store records of type Point of Interest.
Link to edit view: Set the URI where the frontend user can edit his business listings.
Email address FROM: The senders email address. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
Sender name FROM: The senders email name. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
Email address TO: The recipients email address.
Recipient name TO: The recipients email name.
